doc.name: Backoff
doc.description: This actor does the back off after a frame transmission. It randomly choose a slot from the back off window and wait for that amount of time before trying to access the medium.
doc.author: Yang Zhao
doc.port: The input port for channel status message. This has undeclared type.
The input port for backoff message from the Protocol control block.
The output port that produces messages that indicate the backoff is done.
doc.property:
The seed that controls the random number generation. A seed of zero is interpreted to mean that no seed is specified, which means that each execution of the model could result in distinct data. For the value 0, the seed is set to System.currentTimeMillis() + hashCode(), which means that with extremely high probability, two distinct actors will have distinct seeds. However, current time may not have enough resolution to ensure that two subsequent executions of the same model have distinct seeds.
This parameter contains a LongToken, initially with value 0.
